clickToRefreshFavicon: Click to refresh website icon, re-fetching from the website address

confirmDialog.clearDataDescription: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This will delete all saved websites and groups. This action cannot be undone.
confirmDialog.websiteJumpDescription:
Are you sure you want to jump to the initial URL of "{{name}}"?

Tip: You can disable this confirmation dialog in Settings > General.

editWebsite.title: Edit Website

autoLaunch.title: Boot Start

fingerprint.title: Browser Fingerprint Spoofing

jsInjector.title: JS Code Injection

memoryOptimizer.description: Automatically clean inactive websites to free up memory
memoryOptimizer.title: Memory Optimizer

proxy.description: Set proxy for websites and applications, supports HTTP/HTTPS/SOCKS5
proxy.softwareOnlyDescription: Only proxy software requests, not web content (e.g., updates)
proxy.softwareProxyEnabled: Software proxy mode enabled, web proxy will be ignored

sessionIsolation.description: Create separate sessions for each website
sessionIsolation.title: Session Isolation

websiteFingerprint.description: Enable fingerprint spoofing for specific websites
websiteFingerprint.title: Website Fingerprint Spoofing

windowAdsorption.description: Window automatically snaps to screen edges when close
windowAdsorption.title: Window Edge Adsorption

enterNameAndUrlToSave: Please enter website name and URL to save
errorRefreshingFavicon: An error occurred while refreshing the icon

extensions.addExtensionDescription: Select extension folder containing manifest.json or ZIP file
extensions.confirmRemoveDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this extension? This action cannot be undone.
extensions.description: Manage installed Chrome extensions, including Tampermonkey scripts

isolation.description: Configure isolation level and permission control for extensions
isolation.title: Extension Isolation

extensions.title: Extension Manager

extensions.errors.crxHeaderTooLarge: CRX header size exceeds file size

extensions.tips.howToAddDescription: Click the "Add Extension" button and select the extension folder containing manifest.json. Supports standard Chrome extension format.
extensions.tips.isolationTips: Extension isolation can prevent malicious extensions from affecting other extensions and the application
extensions.tips.permissionTips: Please be careful when granting extension permissions, especially sensitive permissions like accessing tabs and modifying network requests
extensions.tips.restartRequired: Some extensions require restarting the app to take effect
extensions.tips.tampermonkeyDescription: You can install the Tampermonkey extension to use userscripts and enhance your web browsing experience.

extensions.validation.crxHeaderTooLarge: CRX header size exceeds file size

failedToGetFavicon: Failed to get website icon, please check the URL
invalidUrl: Please enter a valid website URL

proxy.description: Set proxy for websites and applications, supports HTTP/HTTPS/SOCKS5
proxy.softwareOnlyDescription: Only proxy software requests, not web content (e.g., updates)
proxy.softwareProxyEnabled: Software proxy mode enabled, web proxy will be ignored
proxy.title: Proxy Support

settings.autoCheckUpdatesDescription: Automatically check for application updates on startup
settings.autoLoadExtensionsDescription: Automatically load enabled extensions on startup
settings.cacheDescription: Clear temporary files when closing the application
settings.clearCacheSettingsDescription: Select the types of content to clear when exiting
settings.clearStorageDataDescription: Clear localStorage, sessionStorage and other storage data
settings.clearStorageDataTooltip: Clear website local storage data, which may include website settings, temporary data, etc. Generally does not affect login status
settings.clearAuthCacheDescription: Clear login status and authentication information
settings.clearAuthCacheTooltip: Clear all login status and authentication information, requiring re-login on next visit. Suitable for privacy-conscious users
settings.clearSessionCacheDescription: Clear browsing cache for all websites
settings.clearSessionCacheTooltip: Clear website cache files including images, CSS, JS, etc. Will affect next loading speed but does not affect login status
settings.clearDefaultSessionTooltip: Clear application-level default cache, including global data. Generally does not affect specific website login status
settings.minimizeToTrayDescription: Hide to system tray when closing window, display normally in taskbar when minimizing
settings.isAutoLaunchDescription: Automatically start Pager software when computer boots
settings.quickResetWebsiteDescription: Allow double-clicking website buttons to jump to initial URL
settings.resetWebsiteConfirmDialogDescription: Show confirmation dialog when jumping to web pages
settings.autoCloseSettingsOnWebsiteClickDescripti: Automatically close settings page when clicking on websites
settings.sessionIsolationEnabledDescription: Create independent sessions for each website
settings.crashReportingEnabledDescription: Send crash reports to help improve the application
settings.saveSessionDescription: Save current session state when exiting
settings.allowLocalFileAccessDescription: Allow adding and accessing local files (file:// protocol)
settings.windowAlwaysOnTopDescription: Window always displays at the front
settings.windowAdsorptionEnabledDescription: Window automatically adsorbs when near screen edge
settings.trayEnabledDescription: Show application icon in system tray
settings.collapsedSidebarModeDescription: Choose how the sidebar displays when collapsed
settings.enableExtensionsDescription: Allow loading and using Chrome extensions, including Tampermonkey scripts
settings.jsDescription: Allow web pages to execute JavaScript code
settings.languageDescription: Select the language for the application interface
settings.popupDescription: Allow web pages to open new windows
settings.sessionDescription: Save login information and browsing history
settings.themeDescription: Choose the theme appearance for the application
settings.title: Settings
settings.warning: Warning: These actions will permanently delete your data
